dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Damn! Now I can't see anything.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Lilia show up! What are you doing out here, this is no time for jokes.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I'm already getting cold and irritated.> Uuhhh! LILIAAAAAA! LILIAAAA!

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Wow, there's so much fog that it's impossible to see anything! She sure wasn't here!>Better I go back and search for her in another place.
